question: Justice Hima Kohli sworn in as the first woman chief Justice of which state?
explanation:
Justice Hima Kohli became the first woman Chief Justice of Telangana High Court when she sworn in, in the presence of Governor of the state.
She was earlier serving as a Delhi High Court judge, prior to this promotion. She had also served as the Standing Counsel and Legal Advisor to the New Delhi Municipal Council. The present Chief Justice of Telangana Raghavendra Singh Chowhan is transferred to Uttarakhand High Court.
